    • Method Detail

      • showLoggerWindow

        public void showLoggerWindow()
        display the window. TODO the window should be shut down when the app closes.

      • addItem

        public void addItem(java.lang.String message,
                    int treeLevel)
        add a log message to the window. Messages are always added sequentially but can be displayed in tree form so as to abbreviate the display.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to add
        treeLevel - at which level in the hierarchy to add the message. The message is always added to the last root at the immediately higher level
